game.name: RANGER COMMANDO
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Nostalgic '80s-inspired isometric tactical shooter. Explore randomly generated missions, assassinate officers, free hostages, blow stuff up. No handholding, but easy to pick up!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nostalgic '80s-inspired isometric tactical shooter. Explore randomly generated missions, assassinate officers, free hostages, blow stuff up. No handholding, but easy to pick up!
